extensionDescription.message: Extension for the McGill IMAGE project. This is a beta release.
extensionDescription.description: Brief description of the extension. Will be expanded eventually.

menuItem.description: Fetches IMAGE audio and haptic renderings for an image.

preprocessItem.description: Fetch preprocessed JSON data for an image without renderings.

requestItem.description: Download request to be sent to server.

renderingLabel.description: Label for each rendering returned from the server

segmentAudioSelLabel.description: Label for the SegmentAudio selection menu.

segmentAudioFullRendering.description: Selection option to play through the entire rendering.

segmentAudioButton.description: Label for playing and stopping audio renderings of selected audio segment.

audioRenderingsLabel.message: Audio (Specialized renderings, best experienced with stereo headphones)

monoSoundLabel.description: Label for mono audio option in extension preferences.

preprocessMap.description: Fetch preprocessed JSON data for a map without renderings.
